title: X
data:
==Commands==
*Pressing '''x''' is the command to e'''x'''amine something in view. 
*Pressing '''X''' will bring a large map.

==Symbols==
While playing in console mode:
*'''x''' represents [[unseen horror]]s, [[ancient zyme]]s, and [[small abomination]]s.
*'''X''' represents [[tentacled monstrosities]], [[thrashing horror]]s, [[starcursed mass]]es, [[large abomination]]s, and [[Orb Guardian]]s.

{{alphabet}}
